Features

1. Authentication

The user will require to Login First using their email address and their password to access the system. They will automatically redirected to the right page (Admin Panel, Cashier Panel) depending on their user roles.

2. Help / Documentions

We provide online documentations to help the users with their concerns.

3. Admin Dashboard

In this page. The Admin and SubAdmin can view the sales summary from the last week and counts of current day sales, orders, and transactions.

4. Back Up

To prevent data loss. We add a back up feature to our system so when the admin click the backup button we will generate an excel file containing the data about users, products, and transactions. (Note: the image will be excluded)

5. Manage Products

In this section, the admin can perform the CRUD operation or Create/Read/Update/ and Delete. They can also use the search functionality to find specific products, and change its availability.

6. Transaction History

The admin can view the list of transactions of the specific date.

7. Sales Report

Can view the sales from the specific date range.

8. Manage Users

Only the Admin can access this feature, the sub admin won't be allowed to access this part. The admin can Add, Update, and Remove a User.

9. Archive

Only the Admin can access this feature, the sub admin won't be allowed to access this part. In case the user accidentally remove a product or a user. It can still be recovered using this feature.

10. Update Info

The current login user, can update his Name, Email, Image and Password. (Note: The Sub Admin is only allowed to update his password and image.)

11. Cashier Panel

This can only be accessed by the cashier. The cashier can Add orders, View Order lists, Search for products, Calculate Change, and Generate a receipt.

Frequently Ask Questions

Q: How can I create an account for main Admin?

A: When the system Runs for the first time. It wll redirect you to a form where you can register for Admin Account.

Q: Can I add multiple Admin Account?

A: No. But you can add a Sub Admin account that can also access the Admin Panel.

Q: What are the restriction of Sub Admin?

A: The Sub Admin can also do what an Admin can do. Except Manage Users, and Access the Archive. The Sub Admin Can also not update their name and email.
